Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 76 runs off 59 balls
Jasprit Bumrah conceded two runs and picked up a wicket in the 18th over
Suryakumar Yadav pulled off a brilliant catch to dismiss David Miller in the last over
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma announced retirement from T20Is after India’s World Cup win over South Africa
Virat Kohli looked up the sky with hands aloft after the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup cricket final by seven runs
India lifted their second T20 WC title after 17 years
